article_title: Retiring UCFS president 'a hard act to replace'

article_metadata.description:
This story has been updated from its original form.NORWICH - As president and CEO of United Community and Family Services for 20 years, there is still one glaring weakness in Chuck Seeman’s management style.
He’s not good at sitting still. It’s why he has never employed a secretary, and is more frequently seen in the hallways of one of UCFS’s 14 sites rather than behind his desk.
“The culture of the organization takes on how the CEO really wants to operate it,
article_metadata.author: Adam Benson The Bulletin
